if you put a stain on it, even a water stain, it's not going away, no matter how many times i wash it, stains, streaks stay on ((( Very disappointed
It fits nicely and is a very pretty and thick Satin material

If this skirt had been a little longer I would have kept it.  For reference I am just over 5'7" tall and weigh 175 lbs.  I like a 32" inseam on slacks.  The picture, and caption, indicated this was a maxi skirt and should have been at least ankle length.  However, the skirt measured only 36" long from the waist.  It hit me a coupole of inches above my ankle, and that length looks disproportionate on me.  There were comments re the elastic on the waistband.  The elastic is 1 1/2 inches wide and sewn down at the side seams.  I do not believe that if I had kept it that I would have had any problem/issue with the elastic "rolling" on me.  I ordered the dark green which is truly a very dark green--no emerald, yellow, etc. hues to it.  I scrunched it in my hand and there were no resulting wrinkles.  Other than the length on me, I would recommend this skirt.
Great value for my money! Comfort and quality is awesome ! Such a great find on Amazon for any time of occasion . I want to buy more colors!
I wore this one time for New Year’s Eve dinner and washed it on a delicate cycle and the skirt fell apart.

This skirt is so cute, but after two wears, I have thread pulling all over my skirt. I steam ironed it because it gets very wrinkly, but the first time I steamed it, the (usually very gentle) iron caught a lot of snags. I had small thread lines throughout my skirt. I thought it was just my iron, but the next time I wore it to work, and it caught on something very small on my desk and pulled a giant thread through the front of the skirt. I cannot wear it again and had to go the whole day with a giant rip on the front of my skirt. It’s as sensitive as a pair of tights. Not worth the money.

I ordered two of these skirts..one in cream and one in brown. Upon opening, all looked fine until I went to steam all the wrinkles out of brown one. Fast forward to today, I ho to steam the ivory one and same exact issue. I was planning on wearing for New Years!

I’m 5’ 2 1/2”, 143 lbs and this beautiful skirt fit perfectly. I don’t have large hips, just some belly. I love how elegantly it lays, but I did spray the inside lightly with static cling spray. I tried different methods of getting the wrinkles out but what worked was washing inside out on gentle cycle(cold water only) with no detergent. Tumble dry on low with dryer sheet (again inside out) and iron on the lowest steam setting inside out. I have two colors and they both look fabulous!

Really like this elegant skirt. Dress it up or down. It works with many pieces in a wardrobe and fits well.

评论概述: Soft, comfortable and this light color was fully lined!!!!
评论详情: I first got this skirt in black and it was lovely. It’s soft, true to size (it’s snug and fitted through the waist and hips… I don’t think the XL would fit anyone larger than me… the bottom flares beautifully). I ordered the cream/ivory color when it went on sale again and I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived… it IS FULLY LINED! The black wasn’t lined so I didn’t expect this color to be, and I was fine with that because it’s a nice thickness of satin… but the lining ups the value for me. The color is divine, the fit is exactly the same as the black… hugs me nicely …in a flattering way, and it’s soft, nice thickness, doesn’t wrinkle while wearing and it’s comfortable enough to wear all day. Whether you pair it with a black turtleneck, throw on a simple tunic or dress it up with blouse and belt, it’s a great all around skirt, perfect for any special occasion or simply shopping, lunching, or a Friday night movie at home!
I love the length and the flow of the skirt; however material bunches at the waist. Band itself also twists after wash.

评论概述: I Don't Understand All the Positive Reviews??
评论详情: This skirt is a piece of cheap fabric with an invisible elastic waistband. It looks NOTHING like the picture, but all these buyers are raving about it. I'm 5'8.25" and weigh about 150 pounds. My measurements are 34-28-40. I bought a medium in two colors. The length is much shorter than 37" on the "brown skirt" and even shorter on the gold/brown/tan (can't tell what color it is) "skirt." Both skirts are very tight, despite the fact that I checked the size charts for the garment measurements. The fabric is thick, but it feels like cheap polyester and looks like cheap polyester. It's impossible to even determine what color they are. The bottom of the skirts do not have a trumpet flare as pictured. In fact, the skirt pictured is an a-line skirt with a thin waistband that is clearly visible. The skirts have invisible elastic waistbands that aren't stitched down. The skirts I received are only slightly a-line, and they are not at all flattering if you carry any weight in the high hips right under your waist or on your upper and/or lower stomach. Returned!
Came with stains all over the skirt.

评论概述: I sent it back, because it is true to size
评论详情: I am a petite size 2 for bottoms. I usually wear S, so I wanted to give this skirt a try.  It is too large and it is NOT the skirt's fault. I have a 24 inch waist line, and 37inch around my butt. The size chart said 26.4inch and 39.1inch and I should have believed it. Therefore, the size chart seems to be correct for once! It is a US 4 to 6. At 5'2" the skirt hits the top of my toes.  The material is nice and soft, but seems to wrinkle easily and it is slightly static. All this is normal polyester satin behavior and expected. It's a good skirt, just believe the size chart.

评论概述: Not a fan of the fabric, weird cut to the skirt
评论详情: Usually, any kind of basic black skirt can be made to work with most outfits.  But this BTFBM Women's Spring Summer Skirt 2024 Silk Elegant High Waist Cocktail Party Wedding Mermaid Hem Satin skirt fell short of my expectations.  The fabric doesn't drape well - it sits rather stiffly about the hips and is too firm to have any real sway.  The construction is lacking - very basic, and when examined in daylight, not that well constructed.  I really wanted to like this and I've needed it several times over since I ordered it, but sadly, it just doesn't meet expectations for me.  It's possible that a different body shape could wear this in a more flattering way? If you were tall and lean, the stiffness of the fabric might matter less.  For me, a four star because it was just too much work to make it work.

Pair this lovely skirt with a suitable bodice or dress shirt, and you've got yourself a nice ensemble for a somewhat formal event. You can also use it as a slip or petticoat layer underneath another dress or skirt, if you want more warmth or modesty. Fit is accurate.
I love this skirt! So flattering and fits beautifully! Love the flared hemline and smooth waist! Really soft and body skimming!

This skirt is good quality and not see-through. I say it's just ok because the bottom is a lot more of a mermaid tail effect than I expected. I got a small and it fit snug at the hips and very flared at the bottom stopping right at my ankles. For reference, I'm pear-shaped, 5'2, and my measurements are 30in waist and 40in hip. Maybe a medium would've fit a little better and made the bottom look less dramatic but I think it may have been a little too long then and needed alterations.
I LOVE this skirt! It's so classy, yet can be low-key if needed. It's gorgeous, comfortable, and gives you grace in all of the right places.

This is a beautiful, simple skirt! It falls well. The silky material is comfortable. I'm 5'3 and 198 lbs and the extra large fits nicely. I'm very happy with it! The color matches what is shown online and the size chart is accurate.
I broke my foot and needed a long black skirt for a formal wedding. I tried a few different options, but this is the winner. Great for any elegant occasion.
